class_notes:
(Same as ENVS 349 900)
Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from June 17 - July 22, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: This course will familiarize students with principles of ecological invasions and methods for assessing the spread and impacts of invasive species on a global scale. Students will also become familiar with major sources of exotic species introductions and methods available for prevention and control.
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 131or ENVS_ OX 131 or OX BIOL 111  or BIOL 142 or  BIOL_OX 142 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
sections: Class Nbr: 2238, Section #: 900, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: C. Beck, Status: Open
